title: #530 2BD, 2Bath, W/D, Downstairs, Corner unit, Flooring throughout
posting_body: ['Welcome Home', 'Nestled near the Russian River and spread over 14 beautifully manicured acres in Santa Rosa, natural beauty awaits you at The Alexandar Apartment Homes.', 'Here, residents enjoy restyled 1 and 2 bedroom homes featuring upgraded interiors and countless community advantages.', 'At The Alexandar, everything you need is within reach, including Santa Rosa Plaza, downtown Santa Rosa, Santa Rosa Jr. College and Santa Rosa business parks.', 'Plus, The Alexandar is ideally located at the intersection of US 101 and Hwy 12, providing convenient access to anywhere within Santa Rosa, Sonoma County and virtually the entire northern Bay area.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 31', 'OR Text', '31', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our leasing team.', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 873 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Faux-wood flooring', '- Custom countertops', '- Energy efficient stainless steal appliances', '- Central heating & air conditioning', '- White cabinetry w/ nickel hardware', '- USB chargers installed in kitchen outlet.', '- Private patios or balconies w/ outdoor storage', '- Abundant cabinet & counter space', '*Select units', '*In-home stackable washers & dryers', '*Walk-in closets', 'Community Amenities', '- Resident dog park', '- Covered parking', '- Two Convenient laundry center locations', '- Tot Lot', '- Lush landscaping', '- Picnic area w/ barbeque grills', '- Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '- Parcel Pending Room', '- Hiking/biking trail', '- Dog Wash Station', '- Gated entry', '- Heated swimming pool, spa & sundeck', '*Currently under Renovation.', '*Aqua Lounge, fire place', '*Fitness center', '*Business center', '*Clubhouse w/ plasma TV', 'Pet Policy', 'Breed restrictions', 'Pit Bulls', 'Rottweilers', 'Presa Canario', 'German Shepherds', 'Huskies', 'Malamutes', 'Dobermans', 'Chowchows', "St. Bernard's", 'Great Danes', 'Akitas', 'Terriers (Staffordshire)', 'American Bull Dog', 'Karelian Bear Dog', 'Any hybrid or mixed breed of one of the aforementioned breeds', 'Income Requirements:', 'Monthly gross must be 2.5 times the monthly rent amount.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday - Friday 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Saturday 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sunday- 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'The Alexandar', '750 Apple Creek Lane, Sana Rosa, CA, 95401', 'MgPDO4RJH']
